entities.name: goblet
entities.description: The Goblet is a magical object that can detect cheating in the Triwizard Tournament.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a wise and powerful wizard who is the headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron Weasley is Harry's best friend and a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main protagonist of the story and a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione Granger is Harry's other best friend and a student at Hogwarts.

relationships.description: The Goblet can detect cheating, implying that it can fool people who try to cheat.
Dumbledore has control over the Goblet, as he is the one who sets up the tournament.
Harry and Ron are friends, as they attend Hogwarts together.
Hermione is also a friend of Harry's, as she attends Hogwarts with him.
Ron is jealous of Harry because he always gets attention from the school.
Hermione accuses Ron of being jealous of Harry.
